integration_patterns: Data streaming architecture using AWS Kinesis

evidence.claim: ADEC Healthcare utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure to ensure reliability and flexibility.
ADEC's platform integrates with various EHR systems adhering to FHIR standards.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations and utilizes X12 transaction sets for healthcare data interchange.
Integration patterns include using Azure for data storage and processing in healthcare applications.
The website mentions using HL7 standards for health data exchange in their solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on X12 healthcare data exchange aligns with platform offering.
matched_use_cases: Eligibility checks and remittance advice automation
Integration with EHR for data consistency
